Control Statement: The organization: a. Develops and documents access agreements for organizational information systems;b. Reviews and updates the access agreements [Assignment: organization-defined frequency]; andc. Ensures that individuals requiring access to organizational information and information systems: 1. Sign appropriate access agreements prior to being granted access; and2. Re-sign access agreements to maintain access to organizational information systems when access agreements have been updated or [Assignment: organization-defined frequency].
